text: The men's 400 metres event at the 2019 European Athletics U23 Championships was held in Gävle, Sweden, at Gavlehof Stadium Park on 11, 12, and 13 July.Results ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left" |- align="center" | width=200 bgcolor=gold|Gold||width=200 bgcolor=silver|Silver|| width=200 bgcolor=CC9966|Bronze |- |Fabrisio Saidy |Cameron Chalmers |Brayan Lopez |} ==Records== Prior to the competition, the records were as follows: {| class="wikitable" |- |European U23 record | |44.33 |Rome, Italy |3 September 1987 |- |Championship U23 record | |45.04 |Bydgoszcz, Poland |19 July 2003 |} ==Results== ===Heats=== Qualification rule: First 3 (Q) and the next 4 fastest (q) qualified for the semifinals. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text- align:center" |- !Rank !!
